name: Cleaner Facebook 2014
description:
Since the new redesign is a bit cluttered and plain I tweaked it sligtly so the different articles are better separated, the right column is slightly transparent so it doesn't clash with the newsfeed visually and the chat stands out a little bit. An ili all, quite subtle changes. 
Also, as a side bonus the chat window is taller, since the original one is quite small-ish :)
